description:
This course is all about iPhoneography. According to Wikipedia "iPhoneography is the art of creating photos with an Apple iPhone. This is a style of mobile photography that differs from all other forms of digital photography in that images are both shot and processed on the iOS device."

In this course, you'll learn iPhoneography in a simple, not overly, and fun way. The classes are video and will teach exactly what apps to get, how to use them and ultimately how to capture stunning photographs with an iPhone.
title: iPhoneography - Easily Take Stunning Photos With Your iPhone
